public.name: Public Plan
public.description: All users should subscribe to the Public Plan.

info.title: Canadian Nutrient File (CNF)
info.description: The Canadian Nutrient File (CNF) is the standard reference food composition database reporting the amount of nutrients in foods commonly consumed in Canada.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching food code

200.description: Returns a list of all foods, or if an ID is provided, the list of all foods that correspond to the given food code

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching nutrient name identification number

200.description: Returns a list of all nutrient names, or if an ID is provided, the list of all nutrient names that correspond to the given nutrient name identification number

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching nutrient group identification number

200.description: Returns a list of all nutrient groups, or if an ID is provided, the list of all nutrient groups that correspond to the given nutrient group identification number

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching nutrient source identification number

200.description: Returns a list of all nutrient sources, or if an ID is provided, the list of all nutrient sources that correspond to the given nutrient source identification number

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching food code

200.description: Returns a list of all nutrient amounts, or if an ID is provided, the list of all nutrient amounts that correspond to the given food code

get.description: Returns all measures and conversion factors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching food code

200.description: Returns a list of all serving sizes, or if an ID is provided, the list of all serving sizes that correspond to the given food code

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching food code

200.description: Returns a list of all refuse amounts, or if an ID is provided, the list of all refuse amounts that correspond to the given food code

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit results to those with matching food code

200.description: Returns a list of all yield amounts, or if an ID is provided, the list of all yield amounts that correspond to the given food code

Food.description: It contains a description and the code of each food. A food cannot be further decomposed into ingredients.

food_code.description: The code assigned to a food.

NutrientName.description: It contains a list of different nutrients.

nutrient_name_id.description: The identification number assigned to a nutrient.

nutrient_code.description: The code assigned to a nutrient.

nutrient_symbol.description: The nutrient symbol or abbreviation of the nutrients. They may differ from international nomenclature.

unit.description: The unit of measure (e.g., mg, g, mcg).

tagname.description: A unique Abbreviation for a food component developed by International Network of Food Data Systems (INFOODS) to aid in the interchange of data.

nutrient_decimals.description: The number of decimal places used in the rounding of the nutrient value.

nutrient_web_order.description: The order to display the nutrient.

nutrient_web_name.description: The name of the nutrient for the WEB.

nutrient_group_id.description: The identification number of the nutrient group.

NutrientGroup.description: It contains a list of different nutrient group headings based on similar characteristics of the nutrients.

nutrient_group_id.description: The identification number assigned to a nutrient group.

nutrient_group_name.description: The name of the nutrient group.

nutrient_group_order.description: The order to display the nutrient group.

NutrientSource.description: It contains a list of several sources and/or types of nutrient data.

nutrient_source_id.description: The identification number assigned to a nutrient source.

nutrient_source_description.description: The description of the nutrient source.

nutrient_source_code.description: The code that identifies a nutrient source in Canada.

NutrientAmount.description: Identify the nutrient amount per 100 grams for a food.

food_code.description: The code assigned to each food.

nutrient_value.description: The mean value in 100g, edible portion. (The number of decimal places does not reflect the accuracy of the data).

standard_error.description: The standard error of the mean.

number_observation.description: The number of samples observed for the study.

nutrient_name_id.description: The identification number of the nutrient.

nutrient_web_name.description: The name of the nutrient for the WEB.

nutrient_source_id.description: The identification number of the nutrient source.

ServingSize.description: Measures and conversion factors per food. The conversion factors are food specific multipliers by which the nutrient values for each food may be multiplied to give the nutrients in described portions.

food_code.description: The code assigned to each food.

conversion_factor_value.description: The factor by which one would multiply the nutrient per 100g to obtain nutrient amounts per the measure described.

RefuseAmount.description: Refuse amount is the percent of refuse, or inedible portion, for each food.

food_code.description: The code assigned to each food.

YieldAmount.description: Contains the yield from refuse and/or cooking losses assigned to certain foods. These yields are most often used for food inventory purposes.

food_code.description: The code assigned to each food.

yield_amount.description: The yield from refuse and/or cooking losses.

QueryLang.name: lang
QueryLang.description: Define which language you would like the response to be in

QueryType.name: type
QueryType.description: Define which media type you would like the content to be in

UserKeys.name: user-key
UserKeys.description: The identifier assigned to your account for accessing the API
